meanings.definition: All of the people born and living at about the same time, regarded collectively.
meanings.sent1: Over the generations, our family has grown and expanded.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, traditions are passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The generations gathered for a family reunion, sharing stories and laughter.
meanings.sent4: The wisdom of past generations guides us like a beacon in the night.
meanings.sent5: Through the ages, generations have witnessed great changes in society.

meanings.definition: The average period, generally considered to be about thirty years, during which children grow up, become adults, and have children of their own.
meanings.sent1: It takes several generations for a family tree to grow tall.
meanings.sent2: Each generation faces its own unique challenges and opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The generations seemed to pass by in the blink of an eye.
meanings.sent4: The passing of generations is like the turning of pages in a book.
meanings.sent5: Through the passage of time, generations leave their mark on history.
